common.generalsForAftBetting1: Betting on your favourite events with aftgambiling has never been easier. With LIVE sports betting on hundreds of events daily across dozens of sports from across the globe, you're bound to find the market you're after - and often with industry-leading betting odds!
common.generalsForAftBetting3: tennis betting, horse racing betting, golf betting and much, much more,
common.generalsForAftBetting4: there's something for everyone - and why not try and pick up some Free Bets in our daily Hot Promotions?

referFriend.howItWorksFirstStep: Simply enter your friend's name, email address and contact number in the form below.
referFriend.howItWorksSecondStep: We'll send each friend an email, inviting them to join.
referFriend.howItWorksThirdStep: When your friend opens an account (using the same email address to register), makes his or her first deposit and meets the qualifying requirements, you and your friend can both claim a bonus.
